column1: 375074477756645386;"ca333#0118";"12-Oct-19 10:28 PM";"You could either wait for your bank to approve your transaction and then redo the purchase on the composer page OR you can do a manual payment and we ""unlock"" your payment in the system. Whatever you prefer. (The current payment status will change after a specific timeout - that is not a problem)";"";"";
